stub.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the short part of something long and thin, such as a cigarette or pencil, that is left when the rest has been used
stub.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the part of a ticket that is given back to you after it has been torn, as proof that you have paid
stub.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a piece of a cheque left in a cheque book as a record after the main part has been torn out
stub.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: the part of something such as a cheque that you complete and keep as a record
stub.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: I went through my check stubs and other records to try to find where the money had gone.
